experience.title: Campus Ambassador
experience.description: Mechanica is the technical festival of Mechanical Engineering, presented by Mechanical Engineering Association (MEA), the largest of its kind at IIT Madras. The fest was started as a humble attempt to strengthen the foundations of mechanical students, and, pave a way for them to understand theory in the context of real life, with a glistening variety of contests and events. This attempt has kicked off greatly with foundations from Shaastra, the annual technical festival of IIT Madras. Nevertheless, its relevance to mechanical engineering has helped it blossom out independently.An event in Mechanica standing out as one of the best in the country is Robotics, its prominence being in the nature and novelty of the questions asked. Making a robot which performs meticulous and mind blowing, but , marvellous tasks tests any engineer's mettle. Not withstanding the toughness, many robo-enthusiasts have worked in upholding the quality and standard of the event.MEA organizes various activities like lectures by distinguished practitioners of the profession, Industrial trips, competitions and Mechanica, the annual festival of the Dept of Mechanical Engineering, IIT Madras.
experience.description_html: Mechanica is the technical festival of Mechanical Engineering, presented by Mechanical Engineering Association (MEA), the largest of its kind at IIT Madras. The fest was started as a humble attempt to strengthen the foundations of mechanical students, and, pave a way for them to understand theory in the context of real life, with a glistening variety of contests and events. This attempt has kicked off greatly with foundations from Shaastra, the annual technical festival of IIT Madras. Nevertheless, its relevance to mechanical engineering has helped it blossom out independently.An event in Mechanica standing out as one of the best in the country is Robotics, its prominence being in the nature and novelty of the questions asked. Making a robot which performs meticulous and mind blowing, but , marvellous tasks tests any engineer's mettle. Not withstanding the toughness, many robo-enthusiasts have worked in upholding the quality and standard of the event.MEA organizes various activities like lectures by distinguished practitioners of the profession, Industrial trips, competitions and Mechanica, the annual festival of the Dept of Mechanical Engineering, IIT Madras.

experience.title: Ambassador
experience.description: The International Youth Math Challenge is one of the biggest math competition for students from all around the world: Unleash your creativity, knowledge, and math skills.The International Youth Math Challenge is an international mathematics competition that enables students from all countries to prove their math skills and to unleash their creativity. (Qualification Round) The qualification round 2019 consists of five math problems. In order to qualify for the pre-final round, you need to solve at least three (under 18) to four (over 18) of the problems correctly. You can submit your solutions online until 29. September. All participants receive certificates. (Pre-Final Round) Successful participants can register for the pre-final round in October. You have one week to solve 10 problems of the pre-final round. The registration costs are 8 USD to make this competition possible: Learn More (Final Round) Successful finalists can participate in the final round: You will take an exam of 60 minutes supervised by your teacher. The winners receive certificates and cash prizes worth over 700 USD.
experience.description_html: The International Youth Math Challenge is one of the biggest math competition for students from all around the world: Unleash your creativity, knowledge, and math skills.The International Youth Math Challenge is an international mathematics competition that enables students from all countries to prove their math skills and to unleash their creativity. (Qualification Round) The qualification round 2019 consists of five math problems. In order to qualify for the pre-final round, you need to solve at least three (under 18) to four (over 18) of the problems correctly. You can submit your solutions online until 29. September. All participants receive certificates. (Pre-Final Round) Successful participants can register for the pre-final round in October. You have one week to solve 10 problems of the pre-final round. The registration costs are 8 USD to make this competition possible: Learn More (Final Round) Successful finalists can participate in the final round: You will take an exam of 60 minutes supervised by your teacher. The winners receive certificates and cash prizes worth over 700 USD.

experience.title: Pravega 2019 , Campus Ambassador
experience.description: The Indian Institute of Science boasts an ever-growing platter of enthralling Science events, quizzes, open mics, workshops, fun and game zones, OTG events and street performances at Pravega. It’s upto one’s appetite to juice out their share.The evenings come to life and the fireworks cannot be stopped at the cultural extravaganzas in town. Lined with the best artists from the country and abroad, goosebumps are a regular artefact to get used to.

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIM Lucknow
positions.description: The Entrepreneurship cell of IIM Lucknow is passionately committed to promote Entrepreneurial spirit among each and every individual of this nation. The Entrepreneurship cell is a club in IIM Lucknow consisting of the students committed to fostering the entrepreneurial spirit. It provides a platform for budding entrepreneurs and students through work-shops, case studies, startup-best practices, mentoring and knowledge dissemination.

experience.title: Marketing Intern
experience.description: The DU Post is an online media platform serving you the latest and most trending happenings in and around your very own Delhi University campus. It is an initiative to bring all the unseen news here at your tips. We are Also Providing Information on Various other Trending Categories (visit: www.dupost.co.in to know more) We shall keep you updated every event then and now popping up in the Delhi university, varying from the fests and departmental events to the news that concerns you and never miss out on anything!👍👌👍

experience.title: Social Media Intern
experience.description: Creating awareness about Psychometric test. Lokesh Kumar Lakhotia has almost 12 years of experience in training domain. A management graduate by education and Master Practitioner of Neuro Linguistic Programming, he has worked with industry leaders like Bharti Axa and Bajaj Capital Group. His experience spreads from setting up training function to Life Coaching and Quality Education. He has worked closely with HR function in his capacity as a Life Coach with many organisations.
